PSCT.Base: This card can attack directly. You can only use each of the following effects of "Puppet Pawn" once per turn. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 "Promotion" from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 EARTH Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Puppet Pawn", then your opponent can add 1 monster from their Deck to their hand.
